data.body: when navigating the history view, it's ok if we have to wait for the UI to load and/or prune cache, but there should be some kind of UX feedback, like a spinner and/or some helper text like "loading...prompt histories are BIG, please be patient :-)"
data.description: when navigating the history view, it's ok if we have to wait for the UI to load and/or prune cache, but there should be some kind of UX feedback, like a spinner and/or some helper text like "loading...prompt histories are BIG, please be patient :-)"
data.title: history list navigation is laggy and provides no feedback
